articles.author: John Tufts, Jenny Porter Tilley, Ron Wilkins, Sarah Nelson, Kristine Phillips, Jordan Smith
articles.title: Day 1 of Richard Allen's Delphi murders trial brings new details, heartwrenching testimony - IndyStar
articles.description: Follow along live throughout the trial as journalists from the Indianapolis Star and the Lafayette Journal & Courier cover the case.
articles.content:
Seven years after two teens were brutally killed near a wooded creek in Delphi, Indiana, the trial for the man accused in their deaths is officially underway.
Police say Richard Allen is responsible… [+16475 chars]
